name: Martin Mystery: Monster Invasion
overview: Martin Mystery: Monster Invasion is an European, adventure, exploration and action platform video game based on the 2003-2006 animated series, Martin Mystery and also developed and published by Ubisoft, OUAT Entertainment and Marathon Media (currently as Zodiak Kids Studios) for the Nintendo DS system. An Exploration/Action game with an exceptional life span (8 hours) 15 missions with 6 different types of environment (Torrington Academy, Cavern, Temple, Old Manor House, New Building and Extra-terrestrial) 8 types of monsters and 15 bosses (Zombies, Wizard, Specter, Mutant…) 10 types of mini-games (Battle against monsters, Lock-picking, Assembling…) Stylus driven: Navigation via the touch screen. Character Recognition
